CustomField.description: The value in this field will be "Inside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Shell Loaded] is blank AND NOW() is less than or equal to the [Payroll Shell (P) Target Time] The value in this field will be "Outside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Shell Loaded] is blank AND NOW() is greater than the [Payroll Shell (P) Target Time]
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Shell_Loaded__c) && (NOW() <= Payroll_Shell_P_Target_Time__c ), "Inside SLA", IF(ISBLANK(Shell_Loaded__c) && (NOW() > Payroll_Shell_P_Target_Time__c), "Outside SLA", "") )
CustomField.label: Payroll Shell (P) SLA
